title: iOS 12: How Apple overhauled iPhone notifications
description: iOS 12 for the iPhone has a complete overhaul of how notifications are managed. You can group them, you can turn them off more easily, and Do Not Disturb is also improved. In this episode of Processor, Dieter Bohn breaks it down.
